pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Ai Marmi
pizzerias.description: Known as 'L'Obitorio' (The Morgue) by locals due to its marble tables, this classic Roman pizzeria serves thin, crispy pizzas including a special Hawaiian version for international visitors.

pizzerias.name: Emma Pizzeria
pizzerias.address: Via del Monte della Farina, 28, 00186 Roma RM
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas e Prosciutto (pineapple, cooked ham, fior di latte)
pizzerias.description: Upscale pizzeria using organic flours and premium ingredients. They offer a Hawaiian-style pizza that pairs perfectly with their extensive wine list.

pizzerias.name: Seu Pizza Illuminati
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicana Remix (pineapple, rum-infused ham, smoked provola)
pizzerias.description: Award-winning innovative pizzeria known for experimental combinations. Their Hawaiian-inspired pizza features rum-infused ham and caramelized pineapple.
